attributes.action: Save our libraries and leisure centres on the Wirral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Wirral Borough Council Labour/Liberal Democrat Cabinet proposes to close libraries, leisure centres and to transfer community centres without any guarantees of financial support.
This petition seeks to overturn those proposals and for you to show your support for these services like 'Woodchurch Leisure Centre' and the many volunteers who give up their time for the benefit of the community.
